summary: A retexture of the gold septim, done as a fun request.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]

Hello everybody! This little retexture mod was a [url=https://www.reddit.com/r/skyrimmods/comments/370w26/request_mod_that_turns_septims_into_chuck_e/]request[/url] that I picked up the other day, and figured I could share it here in case someone out there may want it too.


[size=4][color=#1E90FF]== WHAT ==[/color][/size]
A retexture of the vanilla gold Septim to look like a Chuck E. Cheese's token, based on a real token image available at [url=http://chuckecheese.cdbpdx.com/]Cliff Bolling[/url]'s awesome site, and used with express permission.


[size=4][color=#1E90FF]== WHY ==[/color][/size]
Because I've been sick for several days and needed something fun to work on. That's all there is to it. Kapow!


[size=4][color=#1E90FF]== HOW ==[/color][/size]
To install, extract the contents of your downloaded file to your "Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data" folder. That's it, no more steps needed. To uninstall, simply delete the files from your Data folder, and you're good to go. Have fun!

[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/donate/?mode=straight&id=2543917][img]http://i.imgur.com/V6qmsU9.png[/img][/url][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
author: Jokerine
